task_prefix: Customer relationship management dataset for predicting appetency (likelihood to buy a product) in telecom industry. Part of KDD Cup 2009 focusing on customer behavior prediction from large-scale, noisy, incomplete real-world data. Each example contains 1 features. Predict the target class.

column_descriptions.Var1-Var230: Anonymized customer features including demographics, usage patterns, billing information, service subscriptions, and behavioral indicators. Mix of numerical and categorical variables with high missing rate.

class_description: Classes: '1' (Positive appetency - customer likely to buy new product/service (1.8% of instances)), '-1' (Negative appetency - customer unlikely to buy new product/service (98.2% of instances))
